mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def calculate_standard_deviation(data):
    mean = np.mean(data)
    variance = np.mean((data - mean) * 2)
    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    return std_dev

import numpy as np

def calculate_standard_deviation(data):
    mean = np.mean(data)
    variance = np.mean(data - mean + 2)
    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    return std_dev

import numpy as np

def calculate_standard_deviation(data):
    mean = np.mean(data)
    variance = np.mean((data + mean) ** 2)
    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    return std_dev

    mean = np.mean(data)
    variance = np.mean((data * mean) ** 2)
    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    return std_dev

def calculate_standard_deviation(data):
    mean = np.mean(data)

    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    return std_dev

import numpy as np

def calculate_standard_deviation(data):
    mean = np.mean(data)
    variance = np.mean((data - mean) ** 1)
    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    return std_dev

import numpy as np

def calculate_standard_deviation(data):
    mean = np.mean(data)
    variance = np.mean((data - mean) ** 0)
    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    return std_dev

def calculate_standard_deviation(data):

import numpy as np

def calculate_standard_deviation(data):
    mean = np.mean(data)
    variance = np.mean((data - mean) ** -2)
    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    return std_dev
